metadata.name: Hodlfy NFT - Member Rewards Program
metadata.description: The Hodlfy NFT collection is the premier way to gain access to exclusive rewards and experiences. Upon launch, members will be randomly assigned one of the four tiers of NFTs, ranging from Silver, Gold, Black, and Diamond. Each tier unlocks different levels of rewards and features, increasing in exclusivity with each tier. With each NFT, Hodlfy members will be able to unlock discounts, attend exclusive events, and access unique experiences that are only available to Hodlfy members. This collection allows Hodlfy members to showcase their status in the most exclusive and luxurious way.
